==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab|yomi=on|か|り}}
From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=かり}} compound {{m|zh|家裡|tr=kae li<sup>X</sup>|lit=home + inside}}. Compare the reading of modern {{etyl|yue|-}} {{m|zh|家裡|tr=gaa<sup>1</sup> leoi<sup>5</sup>}}, or the meaning of Japanese synonyms {{m|ja|家内|tr=kanai|lit=home + inside||wife}}, {{m|ja|奥様|tr=okusama|lit=inside + honorable||wife}}.

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|yomi=kanon|かり}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|かり}}

# {{lb|ja|sort=かり|obsolete|rare}} one's [[hometown]], one's [[native]] [[village]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=かり|obsolete|rare}} one's [[wife]]

====Usage notes====
Does not appear to be used in modern Japanese.
